EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-06-02-Charlotte NC VMUG & Happy Hour.EMAIL-Cocktail Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Carolina VMUG Cocktail Hour
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, VMTurbo is sponsoring the upcoming Carolina VMUG and will be hosting a happy hour <[[https://events.attend.com/f/1383774725]]> post VMUG at the Mimosa Grill <[[http://www.harpersgroup.com/mimosa.asp]]>. Stop by booth #305 at the VMUG to pick up your ticket or show this email at the door for cocktails and appetizers, on us, from 6:00PM – 8:00PM on 6/2/16. Also, Eric Wright, VMTurbo Technology Evangelist is presenting in room 217 BC from 10:00 AM – 10:40 AM on Bridging the Gap to the Next Generation of IT. Attend our presentation for a chance to win an Amazon Fire TV! Click here <[[https://events.attend.com/f/1383774725]]> to save your spot today. <[[http://www.drakesf.com/]]>- The VMTurbo Team
